script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Get ready for a performance that's sure to get a reaction from our judges! From the heart of Milan, Italy, please welcome Andrea! He's an artist with a lifelong passion for music, and tonight, he's chosen a very special song. Andrea will be performing 'Good Riddance (Time of Your Life)' by Green Day, a song close to his heart and, of course, to Billie Joe's! But here's the twist—he's dedicating it to Sara! Andrea, tell us why you chose this song for Sara.

script.speaker: Participant
script.text: This one's for you, Sara. You're amazing!

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: Well, this is awkward. Just kidding! Great job, Andrea! You've got guts, I'll give you that.  Solid cover, too!

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: Haha, yeah, bold move, Andrea! You're shooting your shot, I like it!  Good song choice, man. Classic.

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: There's a sweetness to this, I have to say.  The vulnerability, the hope...it's all very raw and real.  Good for you, Andrea.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Wow, Andrea, I'm speechless! That was incredibly kind of you.  Thank you.  You certainly have a way with a song.

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Andrea, you've definitely created a memorable 'Google's Got Talent' moment! Judges, time for your decisions!

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: You know what, Andrea?  You've got heart.  I'm gonna say yes, just for the sheer audacity of that dedication!

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: I'm with Billie Joe.  You gotta respect the passion, man. It's a yes from me!

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: Andrea, your sincerity is beautiful.  It's a yes from me.  Follow your heart!

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Andrea, you're incredibly talented.  It's a yes.  And maybe we can chat more later?

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Four yeses, Andrea! You're through to the next round! Looks like love might be in the air at 'Google's Got Talent'!  Stay tuned for more, folks!
